eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.contentawareprofiling.model

Class AbstractModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.contentawareprofiling.model.AbstractModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoarseInterestsModel, DMLModel, FineInterestsModel

    public abstract class AbstractModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a common abstraction for all the developed models. Each model must define how the content aware profile is calculated from a given image collection.
